author: sisbell
msg: Plugin now works with dynamic injector mappings. Had to make decision to use config or attributes: went with attributes since it allows  easier plugin. Downside is that the plugin needs to reside in the NMaven.Plugin.dll. Investigate checking of other assemblies.

author: jonl
msg: Removed unneeded check for empty string.  If the form component's isRequired returned false, the string can be empty and the conversion may accept empty strings.

author: pamarcelot
msg: Setting a property for the workspace in the config.ini file of every distribution of LDAP Studio. Fix for DIRSTUDIO-71 (LDAP Studio installer creates bad shortcuts).
